mapper.insert: insert into comment (user_code, post_code, comment_time, comment_text, comment_depth, comment_parent) values (#{userCode}, #{postCode}, now(), #{commentText}, #{commentDepth}, #{commentParent})
mapper.select: select c.comment_code as commentCode, c.user_code as userCode, c.post_code as postCode, c.comment_date as commentDate, c.comment_text as commentText, c.comment_depth as commentDepth, c.comment_parent as commentParent, u.user_id as userId, u.user_nick as userNick, u.user_img as userImg from comment as c, user as u where c.post_code = #{postCode} and c.user_code = u.user_code
